input.sentences: the bride of the wedding has her picture taken in front of a luxury car .
a wedding guest tries some dance moves before the event begins .
friends and family gather at their tables for the wedding reception
the arrangements provided for the wedding are absolutely stunning .
a wedding guest has taken a wide-shot photograph of the space the event was held in .
output.sentences: It was a big day, today Linda was getting married
She had been practicing her dance for weeks, the first dance at her wedding had to be perfect
The wedding was going perfectly, everyone danced and a good time was had by all
Linda didn't even mind that the florist had sent the wrong flowers
The evening drew to a close of Linda knew it was the happiest day of her life
